We Are The Champions | Queen | Teamwork | The song celebrates the power of collective effort to overcome obstacles and achieve great things. The song's anthemic chorus and uplifting melody create a sense of unity and camaraderie, inspiring listeners to work together towards a common goal. The lyrics speak to the importance of collaboration and mutual support in achieving success and the satisfaction of achieving victory as a group. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hSTivVclQQ0 | Rock | 1977 |Hard Rock, Rock Opera | Teamwork, Success, Achievement

The song encourages individuals to embrace who they are, stand up for themselves, and make their voices heard. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CevxZvSJLk8 | Pop | 2013 | Dance Pop | Confidence, Empowerment, Self-belief  
Fight for Your Right | Beastie Boys | Authenticity | The rebellious anthem promotes the importance of nonconformity, thinking for oneself and resisting pressures to change who you are. The energetic sound and defiant lyrics aim to empower listeners to be their authentic selves without caring what others may think. The song's message is that people should stand up for their rights and not let anyone tell them who they should be. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eBShN8qT4lk | Hip Hop | 1986 | Rap Rock | Authenticity, Nonconformity, Individuality
Born This Way | Lady Gaga | Acceptance | The empowering song aims to spread a message of self-acceptance and embrace of diversity. The uplifting sound and lyrics convey the idea that people should accept and love themselves for who they are, regardless of their perceived flaws or what society says is "normal". The song promotes the message that people are "born this way" and should be free to be their authentic selves. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wV1FrqwZyKw | Dance Pop | 2011 | Dance Pop | Acceptance, Authenticity, Self-love
Rolling in the Deep |  Adele | Healing | The moody ballad is about recovering from a broken relationship and discovering inner strength. The emotive sound and poignant lyrics capture the pain that comes with heartbreak, but the song's message is ultimately one of empowerment and healing. The song conveys the idea that although a breakup is difficult, people have the power to move on from the past and "roll with the punches". | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rYEDA3JcQqw | Pop Soul | 2010 | Pop, Soul | Healing, Empowerment, Resilience
Say | John Mayer | Honest Communication | The mellow pop rock song is about finding the courage to open up to someone, express your true feelings and make yourself emotionally vulnerable. The lyrics convey that real connection involves willing to put aside pretense, drop your guard and engage in honest communication. The tune serves as a reminder that meaning relationships require sincerity, trust and the willingness bare your soul. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S-MQw3I-SOQ | Pop Rock | 2002 | Pop Rock, Singer-songwriter | Honesty, Connection, Vulnerability 
Titanium | David Guetta ft. 	Sia | Strength | The empowering tune aims to make people feel resilient and indestructible. The uplifting electronic sound and lyrics convey the message that although life presents challenges, we each have an inner strength and determination that make us powerful and unbreakable like titanium. The song aims to inspire courage, grit and confidence in listeners to overcome adversity. |https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DKbsaLyN0D8 | Dance Pop | 2011 | Dance Pop, EDM | Strength, Resilience, Confidence
Skyscraper | Demi Lovato | Resilience | The song aims to inspire hope and courage, conveying the message that people have the strength to overcome even their darkest of days. Although the world may break your heart, your spirit remains uncrushable. The emotive pop sound and lyrics serve as a reminder  that no matter what knocks us down, we have the power to rise up again. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WoN8ClJ1gXM | Pop | 2010 | Dance Pop | Resilience, Hope, Empowerment
I won't give up | Jason Mraz | Persistence | The uplifting song promotes the virtue of persistence and refusing to quit in the face of challenges or failure. The inspiring lyrics and melody convey optimism and determination, aiming to motivate listeners to persevere in pursuing their goals and dreams. The song suggests that although the road ahead may not always be easy, we must continue moving forward and never give up.

Fight for Me | Beth Crowley | Loyalty | The poignant ballad expresses devotion, sacrifice and a willingness to fight for someone you care about. The emotive lyrics and melody convey that true love means being there through challenges as well as triumphs, and refusing to give up when times get hard. The song represents the idea that real commitment to another person requires a dedication that can endure struggles, setbacks and all of life's ups and downs. |  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3cDIK6kH6_Q | Pop Soul | 2016 | Pop Soul | Loyalty, Commitment, Love  
Chasing Cars | Snow Patrol | Intimacy | The mellow indie rock song captures the feeling of closeness between two people. The poetic lyrics and melodic sound convey finding solace, meaning and escape with someone you deeply connect with. The song represents the idea that real intimacy involves baring your soul, giving yourself over completely to another, and finding beauty in the simplest of moments together. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GemKqzILV4w | Indie Rock | 2006 | Alternative Rock | Intimacy, Connection, Togetherness
Make You Feel My Love  | Adele | Care | The heartfelt ballad expresses deep care, affection and a desire to provide comfort for someone you love. The emotive lyrics and melancholy sound convey a willingness to sacrifice and go to great lengths to make another person happy. The song represents the idea that real love means being there for one another through all of life's ups and downs. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0WlpALnQdNQ | Pop Soul | 2008 | Pop Soul | Care, Affection, Love 
Stand By You | Rachel Platten | Loyalty | The uplifting pop anthem promotes loyalty, support and sticking together through challenging times. The inspiring sound and lyrics convey the message that true commitment means refusing to abandon those you care about even when the going gets tough. The song aims to give people courage and remind them that they can overcome any hardship as long as they stand united. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bwB9EMpW8eY | Pop | 2015 | Pop Rock | Loyalty, Support, Togetherness  
Unconditionally | Katy Perry | Acceptance | The moving ballad expresses loving someone with an open heart and without judgment. The emotional lyrics and melody convey accepting all of a person - the good as well as the imperfections. The song represents the idea that real love means embracing your partner for who they are without expecting them to change. It inspires listeners to provide compassion and a safe space for vulnerability. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0aSG7htR3Ow | Pop | 2013 | Pop Rock | Acceptance, Compassion, Vulnerability
Counting Stars | OneRepublic | Hope | The uplifting tune inspires optimism and belief in a brighter future. The energetic pop sound and inspiring lyrics convey that although times may be difficult, people should hold onto hope and continue moving forward towards their dreams. The song aims to motivate listeners to see past obstacles and have the courage to keep chasing stars that they may never reach in their lifetime. It serves as a reminder that hope exists as long as people never stop counting the stars. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hT_nvWreIhg | Pop Rock | 2013 | Pop Rock | Hope, Optimism, Courage
Not Afraid | Eminem | Courage | The empowering rap anthem aims to inspire courage in the face of self-doubt and hardship. The defiant lyrics and pounding beat convey overcoming fear and refusing to be held back by obstacles or the criticism of others. The song represents having the boldness to follow your purpose, speak your truth and become the person you were meant to be. It encourages listeners to step out of their comfort zone and pursue their dreams without fear of failure. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j5-yKhDd64s | Hip Hop | 2010 | Hard Rap | Courage, Fearlessness, Purpose
Good Life | OneRepublic | Gratitude | The feel-good tune inspires gratitude and appreciation for life's blessings. The uplifting pop sound and lyrics convey focusing on the positive and making the most of each moment. The song encourages listeners to be thankful for what they have rather than dwell on what they lack. It aims to spread the message that people should embrace the present, express joy for the simple things and celebrate this chance to live a "good, good life". |

The song represents having the boldness to follow your purpose, speak your truth and become the person you were meant to be. It encourages listeners to step out of their comfort zone and pursue their dreams without fear of failure. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j5-yKhDd64s | Hip Hop | 2010 | Hard Rap | Courage, Fearlessness, Purpose
Good Life | OneRepublic | Gratitude | The feel-good tune inspires gratitude and appreciation for life's blessings. The uplifting pop sound and lyrics convey focusing on the positive and making the most of each moment. The song encourages listeners to be thankful for what they have rather than dwell on what they lack. It aims to spread the message that people should embrace the present, express joy for the simple things and celebrate this chance to live a "good, good life". |

The movie shows how facing difficulties can lead to personal growth, especially when approached with an open and curious mind.
